src:
MU Bakal Dapat Dua Tambahan Tenaga di Lini Pertahanan, Siapa Mereka?
07 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah kabar baik datang bagi Manchester United. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer mengonfirmasi bahwa Eric Bailly dan Timothy Fosu-Mensah sedikit lagi sudah bisa memperkuat lini pertahanan Setan Merah.
Baik Bailly dan Fosu-Mensah belum terlibat di skuat United pada musim ini. Keduanya mengalami cedera yang cukup parah dalam beberapa bulan terakhir.
Fosu-Mensah mendapatkan cederanya saat ia dipinjamkan ke Fulham, sementara Bailly mengalami cedera saat pra musim kemarin. Alhasil mereka belum membuat satupun penampilan bagi Setan Merah musim ini.
Solskjaer mengonfirmasi kondisi kedua pemain ini sudah semakin membaik. "Mereka [Bailly dan Fosu-Mensah] sudah berlatih di lapangan dan mereka berlatih didampingi staff kebugaran kami," ujar Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca situasi terbaru kedua bek MU itu id bawah ini.
text:
MU Will Get Two Additional Power in the Line of Defense, Who Are They?
Nov 7 2019, 15:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A good news came for Manchester United. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer confirmed that Eric Bailly and Timothy Fosu-Mensah were a little more able to strengthen the Red Devils defense.
Both Bailly and Fosu-Mensah have not been involved in United's squad this season. Both suffered serious injuries in the last few months.
Fosu-Mensah got his injury when he was loaned out to Fulham, while Bailly was injured in pre-season yesterday. As a result they have not made any appearances for the Red Devils this season.
Solskjaer confirmed the condition of the two players has improved. "They [Bailly and Fosu-Mensah] have been training in the field and they are training along with our fitness staff," Solskjaer told MUTV.

Read the latest situation of the two MU defenders below.
